title: Module: commands/build
Module: commands/run
Readme
content:
ros2-cli This program provides a cli to build and run multiple ros2 nodes.
Setup  git clone https://github.com/DooomiT/ros2-cli cd ros2-cli npm install npm i typescript ts-node -g npm run build npm i -g setup your ros project in following filestructure:  project │ config.yml │ └───components │ │ │ └───Node1 │ │ └─── ... sourcecode of Node1 & ros stuff │ │ │ └───Node2 │ │ └─── ... sourcecode of Node1 & ros stuff │ │ │ └───... │ └───bin │ executeNode1.sh │ executeNode2.sh │ ...  run ros2-cli ...  Development Contribution  contributions via PR are welcome

title: ros2-cli
